definitions: the quality of being trustworthy or of performing consistently well

examples.text: the car's background gives me every confidence in its reliability

shortDefinitions: consistently good in quality or performance

definitions: the degree to which the result of a measurement, calculation, or specification can be depended on to be accurate

examples.text: these data throw doubt on the reliability of national statistics

shortDefinitions: degree to which result of measurement, calculation, or specification can be depended on to be accurate
